The 'Russian people' (, russkiye) are an East Slavic ethnic group native to
Russia, [http://www.britannica.com/EBchecked/topic/548156/Slav "Slav."]
EncyclopÃ¦dia Britannica Online. 30 July 2011. speaking the Russian
language and primarily living in Russia and neighboring countries.

According to the 2010 census, ethnic Russians make up about 81% of the
population of Russia.
